vsParam:
Ah. Senpais, you're back!!
Are you alright!? Did you get hurt!?

Yeah. Are you alright!?
Let me use the Recovery Magic on you guys right now!?

Ha ha... No need, Sensei.
Anise has used it on us...

Hehe. We thrashed him, of course!
I really want you to see how heroic I was! What a pity!

Cresson... You can't say that just because Peppermint
did more than you in battle... This isn't nice.
Not at all...! Well, that's not what happened...

The monsters outside are all cleared.
And it's so lucky that no one got severely wounded.

Hmm—I didn't fully enjoy myself from the fighting...!
Hey you, want to practice fighting skills with me?

No way!!
...[px], I managed to reciprocate one of your favors today!

Hey, you! Be quiet! As long as you're in the Academy, you
must follow the orders from the Student Union President!

Ha ha ha! Angry Hazel is just as horrifying.
Popy, you agree, right?

I-I have no comments...
Bad things will happen to me if I say something wrong...

... Hehe. Thank you so much, [px].
We couldn't have done it without you.

Many thanks to you. It's such a relief to see you come back
safe. That guy... Calendula escaped again, didn't he?

That guy will... Never mind.
Ha ha. It's our problem.

... By the way, everyone. I think you haven't said that
sentence to our triumphant warriors, have you?

Ah. Yeah!
Hazel Senpai, can I start?

Hmm—Let me think about it. OK. You do it.
But, don't stutter.

Ha ha ha. Got it.
So, Senpais! Ready! Start!!

Uh? I didn't expect to see Calendula beaten up like that.
Those guys are more troublesome than I thought.

But never mind. Even those guys are troublesome,
I won't change my plan~

I'll bring chaos...
And then one day...

I'll ruin everything in this world.
Ha ha... Ha ha ha ha ha ha! Ha—Ha ha ha ha!
